title: My Sister Won't Talk to Us
description:
Hayley misses her nephew who she no longer sees since his mom isn't speaking to Hayley's family. - Dr. Laura: "Sometimes there's no reasoning with an ungrateful person."

Have you ever had a friend or family member shut you out? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. Become a Dr. Laura Family Member: https://www.drlaura.com/ See https://www.drlaura.com/privacy-policy for privacy information.
